title: Insects and their homes
brief_description: Insects homes are of many forms, exist in numerous places, and are made of many kinds of materials. We observe a variety of such homes, from the simple cocoon in which the moth develops to the complex ant colony, and we see the many ways in which such homes help their inhabitants to survive.
